biodata.description: Request biodata info and data by bio ID

optional.output-fmt: Format for blob data to return in (instead of raw data), (accepts: asn|asnb|json|xml), (requires: blob-only)

flags.slim-tse: Return split info blob if available, or nothing, (excludes: no-tse,smart-tse,whole-tse,orig-tse)
flags.smart-tse: Return split info blob if available, or original blob, (excludes: no-tse,slim-tse,whole-tse,orig-tse)
flags.whole-tse: Return all split blobs if available, or original blob, (excludes: no-tse,slim-tse,smart-tse,orig-tse)

optional.output-fmt: Format for blob data to return in (instead of raw data), (accepts: asn|asnb|json|xml), (requires: blob-only)

flags.slim-tse: Return split info blob if available, or nothing, (excludes: no-tse,smart-tse,whole-tse,orig-tse)
flags.smart-tse: Return split info blob if available, or original blob, (excludes: no-tse,slim-tse,whole-tse,orig-tse)
flags.whole-tse: Return all split blobs if available, or original blob, (excludes: no-tse,slim-tse,smart-tse,orig-tse)

chunk.description: Request blob data chunk by chunk ID

optional.output-fmt: Format for blob data to return in (instead of raw data), (accepts: asn|asnb|json|xml), (requires: blob-only)

named_annot.description: Request named annotations info by bio ID

optional.output-fmt: Format for blob data to return in (instead of raw data), (accepts: asn|asnb|json|xml), (requires: annot-only)

flags.slim-tse: Return split info blob if available, or nothing, (excludes: no-tse,smart-tse,whole-tse,orig-tse)
flags.smart-tse: Return split info blob if available, or original blob, (excludes: no-tse,slim-tse,whole-tse,orig-tse)
flags.whole-tse: Return all split blobs if available, or original blob, (excludes: no-tse,slim-tse,smart-tse,orig-tse)

GET.description: Request biodata info by bio ID

POST.description: Batch request biodata info by bio IDs

mandatory.List of bio IDs: One bio ID per line in the request body

flags.all-info-except: Return all info except explicitly specified by other flags
flags.chain-state: Return chain state info (in seq_state pair)
flags.name: Use name for canonical ID info, if returned

optional.service: PSG service name or host:port pair, (default: PSG2)
